event_registry_properties.name: action
event_registry_properties.item: Schedule a repair procedure to replace the DIMM. Use fmadm faulty to identify the DIMM to replace.
event_registry_properties.name: description
event_registry_properties.item: A pattern of correctable errors has been observed suggesting the potential exists that an uncorrectable error may occur.
event_registry_properties.name: details
event_registry_properties.item: The Message ID: <tt>%MSGID%</tt> indicates a predicted problem with a memory module failing; it should be repaired in order to restore the system.
event_registry_properties.name: impact
event_registry_properties.item: None at this time. However, the potential uncorrectable error warrants proactive service action to avoid any unplanned system outages.
event_registry_properties.name: response
title
event_registry_properties.item: Memory module correctable errors exceeding acceptable levels.
